title: 706 - Sleep With Whispers
description:
A sleepy tribute to the Sleep Whispers podcast and my buddy Harris, this episode is sans-whispers.Check out “Sleep Whispers” podcasts wherever you listen to podcasts or here https://sleepwhispers.com/

(You can find all of our sponsors or become a patron on our new websitehttp://www.sleepwithmepodcast.com story starts at about 20:40)


Welcome our newest sponsor Green Chef!!Green Chef is a USDA certified organic company that includes everything you need to easily cook delicious meals that you can feel good about. Meals plans include: Paleo, Vegan, Vegetarian, Keto, Gluten-Free, Omnivore, and Carnivore.For $50 off your first box of Green Chef, go to http://www.GreenChef.us/sleep


We’re excited to partner with tonight’s sponsor CALM, the #1 app for sleep, meditation, and relaxation. It was even named Apple’s 2017 App of the Year. For a limited time, Sleep With Me listeners can get 25% off a Calm Premium subscription at http://www.calm.com/sleepwithme. It includes unlimited access to ALL of Calm’s amazing content. Get started today at CALM.COM/SLEEPWITHME.
